hero.label: So that every day counts
hero.description: Frames designed to last. Crafted by hands that still know how.

excellence.label: The Renaissance Excellence
excellence.title: FOUR PILLARS.
excellence.description: Renaissance doesn't make ordinary glasses. We create symbols of a French vision of luxury, rooted in history and looking to the future.
excellence.pillar1Desc: Inspired by the symbols of French royalty, our collections celebrate the excellence of a unique heritage.
excellence.pillar2Desc: The union of Parisian design and Korean precision for impeccable quality of execution.
excellence.pillar3Desc: Mazzucchelli acetate, high-grade stainless steel and premium finishes for eyewear that stands the test of time.
excellence.pillar4Desc: Against fast fashion, we create pieces designed to last, with transparency and responsibility.

fabrication.label: Craftsmanship
fabrication.title: OUR
fabrication.subtitle: Craftsmanship.
fabrication.description: A pair of Renaissance means 250 steps. French hands for the vision. Korean hands for precision. Two countries. One standard: the one that lasts.
fabrication.step1Desc: Each acetate plate is selected for its unique veining.
fabrication.step2Desc: 48 hours of polishing for an incomparable shine.
fabrication.step3Desc: Each hinge is hand-adjusted with watchmaking precision.

histoire.label: Our story
histoire.title: THE WORLD FORGETS.
histoire.subtitle: We remember.
histoire.description: Renaissance. A word for those who refuse to let everything disappear. For gestures to be lost. For beauty to become disposable.

tryInStore.label: Partner network
tryInStore.title: TRY IN STORE.
tryInStore.subtitle: Order online.
tryInStore.description: Try our creations at one of our 200+ partner opticians. Order online, free shipping, free returns within 30 days.

allFrames.title: ALL OUR
allFrames.subtitle: Creations.
allFrames.description:
Collections, limited editions and unique pieces.
A single gesture: the one that refuses oblivion.

reassurance.label: Our commitments
reassurance.title: BY YOUR SIDE.
reassurance.subtitle: Always.
reassurance.item3Desc: We stand behind what we make

seo.title: Artisanal Luxury Eyewear
seo.description: Discover RENAISSANCE Paris, a French luxury eyewear house. Exceptional artisanal craftsmanship, noble materials and timeless design. Created in Paris with passion.
